response.overview: Two young missionaries are forced to prove their faith when they knock on the wrong door and are greeted by a diabolical Mr. Reed, becoming ensnared in his deadly game of cat-and-mouse.
response.title: Heretic

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
